item.description:
We'll be showing 2 episodes on the big screen (due to licensing restrictions, we are not allowed to say any titles online). If you can only come for the earlier episode, or just the later one, it is no problem (but please let me know ahead of time)!

Prizes for Best Costume and for Trivia Winners!

Admission is free, but getting seats can be done either by:

1. Reserving BUT only members can reserve (up to 4 reservations per member). Please let me know if you are a member of pn. Click here if you are interested in details about membership.

2. Arriving early to grab unreserved seating.

Approx. Schedule
remember--it's ok to come for just part of the night

6:15pm meet inside Popcorn Noir. If you wish to order a drink, they have soft drinks, tea, coffee, hot chocolate, wine, beer, sake, and hard ciders.

6:45pm a brief trivia contest

7:00pm Episode A

8:30pm Episode B

You are not required to order anything, but because the theatre is also a bar/restaurant, it's welcomed and is a good way to support this awesome venue. They don't charge admission...their only revenue is from memberships and purchase of food/drink. You can actually order anytime before the episodes start or while they are playing. They give you a special light to click so they know you want to order something. Here is a link to their menu. "The Lobby at Popcorn Noir," their attached cafe/bar next to the theatre has just fully opened this week (last week was lunch only) and we can meet there before the movie. I am setting this up as a separate Meetup for 5:30 this Thursday...if interested, please RSVP for that ASAP.

Best,
Jonathon
item.name: British Sci-Fi Night
